body.p: The IASB therefore decided that applying the practical expedient, which requires an entity to apply paragraph B5.4.5 of IFRS 9 to account for changes in the basis for determining the contractual cash flows of financial assets and financial liabilities as a result of the reform, would provide more useful information to users of financial statements in circumstances when the changes are limited to changes required by the reform and would be less burdensome for preparers for the reasons noted in paragraph BC5.306.
